Desc.entry: Facilities include all weather courts, 3 of which are floodlit. Showering facilities. Club house with bar. Lock up premises. All members have keys. Social events including barbeques and quizzes. Holds an annual dinner with trophy presentation in November/December.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon at 6pm (ladies match practice, Apr-Jul), Tues & Fri 7-10pm (adults social tennis), Wed at 6pm (men's match practice, Mar-Sep), Thurs at 6pm (ladies team matches, May-Jul), Fri 4-6pm (junior team practice), Sat 9.30am-12noon (junior coaching), 2pm (men's team matches Apr-Jun, mixed matches Jul-Sep), Sun 10am-2pm (junior team matches, May-Jul), 2-5pm (adults' social tennis), 6-7.30pm (junior social tennis)
